New Records: Juan Soto became the 10th player in franchise history to record three hits in their first postseason game with the Yankees.
Key Match Events: The Yankees' 6-5 victory over the Royals in Game 1 of the American League Division Series
Pre-Game Insights: Juan Soto said that the coming payday is not on his mind, and the team is focused on trying to get another championship.
Post-Match Reflections: Austin Wells praised Soto's ability to get on base and be a tough out, and Soto expressed his gratitude for the fans' support.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The crowd of 48,790 at Yankee Stadium was described as 'electric', and Soto received a loud ovation during pre-game introductions.
Others: Oswaldo Cabrera received guidance from Anthony Rizzo, who has been helping fill-in first basemen this season.
